Juliet George

Full Stack Developer

♥

I was born in the south of Nigeria. I was raised by my grandparents who emphasized the importance of science and technology in the lives. My grandfather would buy the newest computers and show me how to you them. This was how my love for computers began. My first device was a Samsung SPH A680, I cherished my phone but also used it to take pictures and play video games.

I have recently completed a 12-week Coding BootCamp with the University of Berkeley Extension, where I acquired several in demand skills. Please take a look at my Portfolio page to see the top projects I have worked on. I am looking forward to starting out my career as software engineer. I have lived in San Francisco for two years and worked as a Test engineer and IT Engineer. I love living and working in the city. My favorite thing to do is checking out restaurants in North Beach with my friends.

) } export default aboutPage;
